solution_line_template: So, Joy can read {pages_per_20min} x {sets_per_hour} = <<{pages_per_20min}*{sets_per_hour}={pages_per_hour}>>{pages_per_hour} pages in an hour.
It will take her {total_pages}/{pages_per_hour} = <<{total_pages}/{pages_per_hour}={hours_needed}>>{hours_needed} hours to read {total_pages} pages.
